name: corrosively
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is harmful and causes bad feelings: We have become corrosively cynical in our society. A corrosively unpopular prime minister will damage his party.
in a way that causes damage by chemical action: The substance can be corrosively acidic.
More examplesFewer examplesChildren can be corrosively mean.Long-time resentments were simmering away corrosively.Journalists have become corrosively cynical about this government.The rust eats away corrosively at the metal.
